relation.text: copied E G A Canterbury Octbr . 26 th - 1772
'll take great care for the future
am heartily fatigued every day , & this must be the Case all this Winter
find that you are above five Hundred years
my whole exercise is on Horseback & that can be but only once per day , now
thank God I am so well , a few months ago
next year at Buxton will make
hope to be happy in the Company of my dear Girl I am not particularly acquaint wt the Officers now
